org.jacp.javafx.rcp.action

Class FXAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jacp.javafx.rcp.action.FXAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, IAction<javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>

    public final class FXAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAction<javafx.event.Event,java.lang.Object>
    represents an action which is fired by an component, has a target and a message targeting the component itself or an other component
    Author:
    Andy Moncsek
